title: Cw1155ReceiveMsg
description: Cw1155ReceiveMsg should be de/serialized under `Receive()` variant in a ExecuteMsg

from.description: The account that the token transfered from

operator.description: The account that executed the send message

Binary.description:
Binary is a wrapper around Vec<u8> to add base64 de/serialization with serde. It also adds some helper methods to help encode inline.

This is only needed as serde-json-{core,wasm} has a horrible encoding for Vec<u8>
